title: Where and how can a 17 yr old start his adventurous quest to unravel the mysteries of the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Starting with a good book on physics would be the best place to look into. It'll not just help you in getting educated, but also open up your mind to a lot of different perspectives on all of the universes. I'd recommend starting with your regular physics textbook and then once you've finished that, buy the full volume of Richard Feynman's lectures.

either become a quantum physicist or a PG/Ph. D in archaeology and then start unravelling the mysteries of the world …. you can start from the ancient site locations or places considered haunted (if u not afraid of unknown) or become a freelance deep sea diver or aquanaut and start with the oceans and then move to land just like the olden days…
